channel.title: CVE Feed for Trend Micro -- Trend Micro OfficeScan
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Trend Micro -- Trend Micro OfficeScan

item.title: CVE-2017-11394|2024-09-16T16:53:36.897Z -- trend%20micro -- trend%20micro%20officescan
item.description: Proxy command injection vulnerability in Trend Micro OfficeScan 11 and XG (12) allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code on vulnerable installations. The specific flaw can be exploited by parsing the T parameter within Proxy.php. Formerly ZDI-CAN-4544.
